goals__remit: Metallo excels in MULTI-METAL RECYCLING and REFINING of non-ferrous metals. Over 90 years of experience resulted in the highest level set-up of pyro- and hydrometallurgical processes which can treat the most complex secondary raw materials and refine them into new metal products to supply the metal consuming industry.
